snippet: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis will hold talks about his future with chairman Jeremy Peace at the end of the season despite having 18 months left on his contract....

headline.main: Pulis to Discuss West Brom Future at End of Season
headline.print_headline: Pulis to Discuss West Brom Future at End of Season

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis will hold talks about his future with chairman Jeremy Peace at the end of the season despite having 18 months left on his contract.

snippet: - A goal out of nowhere from Jose Holebas on Sunday inspired Watford to a 1-0 win at Middlesbrough, who have now gone six games without a Premier League win....

headline.main: Watford's Holebas Stuns Boro With Superb Strike
headline.print_headline: Watford's Holebas Stuns Boro With Superb Strike

lead_paragraph: - A goal out of nowhere from Jose Holebas on Sunday inspired Watford to a 1-0 win at Middlesbrough, who have now gone six games without a Premier League win.

snippet: Argentina have asked English Premier League club Everton to make defender Ramiro Funes Mori available for the Rio Olympics, national team coach Gerardo Martino said on Monday....

headline.main: Argentina Want Everton's Funes Mori for Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: Argentina Want Everton's Funes Mori for Rio Olympics

lead_paragraph: Argentina have asked English Premier League club Everton to make defender Ramiro Funes Mori available for the Rio Olympics, national team coach Gerardo Martino said on Monday.

snippet: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp....

headline.main: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp

lead_paragraph: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp.

snippet: Kenya's competition authority is investigating the Kenyan pay TV business of South Africa's Naspers, which local rivals say has unfairly monopolised broadcasts of popular European football matches, a source at the authority said....

headline.main: Kenyan Watchdog Investigates Naspers Over Soccer Broadcasts
headline.print_headline: Kenyan Watchdog Investigates Naspers Over Soccer Broadcasts

lead_paragraph: Kenya's competition authority is investigating the Kenyan pay TV business of South Africa's Naspers, which local rivals say has unfairly monopolised broadcasts of popular European football matches, a source at the authority said.

headline.main: Burnley Stun Liverpool 2-0 With Classy Double
headline.print_headline: Burnley Stun Liverpool 2-0 With Classy Double

snippet: England goalkeeper Tom Heaton is confident that Burnley's promotion to the Premier League will boost his chances of furthering his international career....

headline.main: Heaton Hopes Burnley Promotion Will Boost England Prospects
headline.print_headline: Heaton Hopes Burnley Promotion Will Boost England Prospects

lead_paragraph: England goalkeeper Tom Heaton is confident that Burnley's promotion to the Premier League will boost his chances of furthering his international career.

snippet: Hull City boss Steve Bruce has held informal discussions with the Football Association (FA) for the England manager's job, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Hull Boss Bruce Interviewed for England Job-Reports
headline.print_headline: Hull Boss Bruce Interviewed for England Job-Reports

lead_paragraph: Hull City boss Steve Bruce has held informal discussions with the Football Association (FA) for the England manager's job, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Premier League champions Leicester City paid a club record fee for Sporting Lisbon's Algeria striker Islam Slimani just hours before the transfer window closed on Wednesday....

headline.main: Champions Leicester Break Club Record for Striker Slimani
headline.print_headline: Champions Leicester Break Club Record for Striker Slimani

lead_paragraph: Premier League champions Leicester City paid a club record fee for Sporting Lisbon's Algeria striker Islam Slimani just hours before the transfer window closed on Wednesday.

snippet: Everton sealed one of the costliest signings of the mid-season  window when Senegal striker Oumar Niasse joined in a 13.5 million pounds transfer from Lokomotiv Moscow on Monday....

headline.main: Everton in Big-Money Swoop for Senegal Striker Niasse
headline.print_headline: Everton in Big-Money Swoop for Senegal Striker Niasse

lead_paragraph: Everton sealed one of the costliest signings of the mid-season  window when Senegal striker Oumar Niasse joined in a 13.5 million pounds transfer from Lokomotiv Moscow on Monday.
